# ISqliteSwap.DoSwap method

Perform a backup operation (or restore) between two databases.
```csharp
public void DoSwap(string srcFilename, string destFilename)
```
| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| srcFilename | Name of the source filename of the db. |
| destFilename | Name of the destination filename of the db. |
